com.gotenna.sdk.messages

Class GTTextAndLocationRequestMessageData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gotenna.sdk.messages.GTBaseMessageData
      • com.gotenna.sdk.messages.GTTextOnlyMessageData
        • com.gotenna.sdk.messages.GTTextAndLocationRequestMessageData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GTMessageDataProtocol

    public class GTTextAndLocationRequestMessageData
extends GTTextOnlyMessageData
    Represents a goTenna message that was sent/received. This message represents a location share request with a text message. Created on 3/23/15.
